title: Land of the Brahmaputra
creator_contributor_role: Documentary Films of India, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/India - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/India - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Rites and ceremonies - India
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/India - Religion
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rites and ceremonies - India
description: The people of the plains of the Brahmaputra, an ancient river highway, with a tragic history of floods. The valley people; religion, agriculture, silk spinning; family life, the marriage rites; the market place; the capital of an ancient kingdom; the plantations; the growth of secondary industries; the elephants of Assam.
